quote: Music is a fantastic peacekeeper of the world, it is integral to harmony, and it is a required fundamental of human emotion.

quote: Those who have virtue always in their mouths, and neglect it in practice, are like a harp, which emits a sound pleasing to others, while itself is insensible of the music.

quote: I've been really enjoying writing articles and writing music and music for movies.

quote: My message to anyone who's afraid that they can't write music when they're happy is 'Just trust the passion.' The passion can write a lot of things.

quote: Music will always be a part of my life. I love music and I don't care how many units I sell.

quote: It is jazz music that called me to be a musician and I have always sang the songs that moved me the most.

quote: I don't think I'd ever make an album of just covers because I love writing my own music.

quote: Learning music by reading about it is like making love by mail.

quote: Placebo is music for outsiders, by outsiders and our gigs are like conventions of outcasts, which is cool.

quote: I think music is the most phenomenal platform for intellectual thought.

quote: Musicians are there in front of you, and the spectators sense their tension, which is not the case when you're listening to a record. Your attention is more relaxed. The emotional aspect is more important in live music.

quote: Good music is very close to primitive language.

quote: What is music. A passion for colonies not a love of country.

quote: Music is God's gift to man, the only art of Heaven given to earth, the only art of earth we take to Heaven.

quote: The William Penn Hotel in Pittsburgh... was the place where Champagne Music was born.
name: Lawrence Welk

quote: If you think my music is sentimental and self-absorbed, I agree with you.
name: James Taylor

quote: I grew up with classical music when I was a ballet dancer. Now when I have to prepare an emotional scene, to cry or whatever, I listen to sonatas. Vivaldi and stuff. It's just beautiful to me.
name: Diane Kruger

quote: One time I introduced my orchestra as the Shampoo Music Makers instead of the Champagne Music Makers.
name: Lawrence Welk

quote: Music is my living. I enjoy selling my music.
name: James Taylor

quote: I find that classical music helps put me in a place that is very calming and allows me to express emotion through my body. I played clarinet as a child, so I guess I have a bit of a musical ear.
name: Diane Kruger
